loopcity 0.1.0
  • Reference

connectLoopAnchors

connectLoopAnchors.Rd

connectLoopAnchors

Usage

connectLoopAnchors(loops, overlapDist)

Arguments

loops

GInteractions object of loops

overlapDist

an integer representing the farthest distance in base pairs to make a connection

Value

GInteractions object

Examples

mergedLoops <- mergeAnchors(GM12878_10KbLoops, 1)

connectLoopAnchors(mergedLoops, 1e6)
